tool_description: Lexicala API is a REST interface offering access to dictionary and lexical data from our monolingual, bilingual, multilingual and learner’s dictionaries in JSON format.
name: Lexicala
title: Lexicala

api_list.name: RDFEntires
api_list.description: get specific RDF entry by its unique ID

required_parameters.name: entry_id
required_parameters.description: The entry ID of the entry

api_list.name: SearchRDF
api_list.description: search for RDF entries with filters in query

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: The language code of the entry’s language. For an extensive list of language codes, see GET /languages

optional_parameters.name: morph
optional_parameters.description: Whether to search in headword inflections if exist. The default value is 'false'

optional_parameters.name: analyzed
optional_parameters.description: Whether to search using the language analyzer or to get exact matches only. The default value is 'false'

api_list.name: SearchEntries
api_list.description: search for entries with filters in query

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The headword text to search for

optional_parameters.name: polysemous
optional_parameters.description: Whether to only return polysemous entries

optional_parameters.name: source
optional_parameters.description: The resource to search within. The default value is 'global', i.e. the Global series

optional_parameters.name: morph
optional_parameters.description: Whether to search in headword inflections if exist. The default value is 'false'

optional_parameters.name: gender
optional_parameters.description: The grammatical gender to search for

optional_parameters.name: monosemous
optional_parameters.description: Whether to only return monosemous entries

optional_parameters.name: pos
optional_parameters.description: The part of speech (POS) to search for

optional_parameters.name: sample
optional_parameters.description: Number of randomly-sampled results to return

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: The language code of the entry’s language. For an extensive list of language codes, see GET /languages

optional_parameters.name: analyzed
optional_parameters.description: Whether to search using the language analyzer or to get exact matches only. The default value is 'false'

optional_parameters.name: subcategorization
optional_parameters.description: The subcategorization (e.g. countable, transitive, …) to search for

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The grammatical number to search for

api_list.name: Search

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The headword text to search for

optional_parameters.name: polysemous
optional_parameters.description: Whether to only return polysemous entries

optional_parameters.description: Whether to search in headword inflections if exist. The default value is 'false'

optional_parameters.name: source
optional_parameters.description: The resource to search within. The default value is 'global', i.e. the Global series

optional_parameters.name: subcategorization
optional_parameters.description: The subcategorization (e.g. countable, transitive, …) to search for

optional_parameters.name: pos
optional_parameters.description: The part of speech (POS) to search for

optional_parameters.name: gender
optional_parameters.description: The grammatical gender to search for

optional_parameters.name: analyzed
optional_parameters.description: Whether to search using the language analyzer or to get exact matches only. The default value is 'false'

optional_parameters.name: monosemous
optional_parameters.description: Whether to only return monosemous entries

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: The language code of the entry’s language. For an extensive list of language codes, see GET /languages

optional_parameters.name: sample
optional_parameters.description: Number of randomly-sampled results to return

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The grammatical number to search for

api_list.name: Test
api_list.description: test that the API is running
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lexicala1.p.rapidapi.com/test"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lexicala1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lexicala1.p.rapidapi.com/test"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lexicala1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Languages

import requests

url = "https://lexicala1.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lexicala1.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Senses

required_parameters.description: The sense ID of the sense
